scripts.test1: npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require features/support/hooks.ts --require features/step_definitions/**/*.ts --format html:reports/cucumber-report.html --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --exit
scripts.test: npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --config cucumber.ts --format html:reports/cucumber-report.html --format json:reports/cucumber_report.json --exit
